/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall \ host=&Kickstart_PrivateHostname; network=all \ service="all" protocol="all" action="REJECT" \ chain="INPUT" flags="--dport 372 --sport 1024:65535" rulename="A10-REJECT-411-TCP" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall global network=private service="all" \ protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT" rulename="A20-ALL-PRIVATE" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall global network=public service="ssh" \ protocol="tcp" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT" \ flags="-m state --state NEW" rulename="A20-SSH-PUBLIC" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall global network=public service="all" \ protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT" \ flags="-m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED" rulename="A30-RELATED-PUBLIC" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall global network=public service="all" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ flags="--dport 0:1023" rulename="R900-PRIVILEGED-TCP" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall global network=public service="all" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ flags="--dport 0:1023" rulename="R900-PRIVILEGED-UDP" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost chain=INPUT \ flags="-m state --state NEW --source &Kickstart_PublicNetwork;/&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;" \ protocol=tcp service=https action=ACCEPT network=public rulename="A40-HTTPS-PUBLIC-LAN" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost chain=INPUT \ flags="-m state --state NEW --source &Kickstart_PublicNetwork;/&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;" \ protocol=tcp service=www action=ACCEPT network=public rulename="A40-WWW-PUBLIC-LAN" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost network=public \ output-network=private service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" \ chain="FORWARD" flags="-m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED" rulename="A50-FORWARD-RELATED" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost network=private \ service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="FORWARD" rulename="A60-FORWARD" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost output-network=public \ service="nat" protocol="all" action="MASQUERADE" chain="POSTROUTING" rulename="MASQUERADE" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost network=all service="8649" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block ganglia traffic from non-private interfaces" rulename="R10-GANGLIA-UDP" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost network=all service="3306" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block mysql traffic from non-private interfaces" rulename="R20-MYSQL-TCP" rulesrc="system"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall host=localhost network=all service="40000" \ protocol="tcp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block foundation mysql traffic from non-private interfaces" rulename="R30-FOUNDATION-MYSQL" rulesrc="system"

/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host firewall localhost | \ /opt/rocks/bin/rocks report script \ attrs="{'Kickstart_PublicNetwork':'&Kickstart_PublicNetwork;', \ 'Kickstart_PublicNetmask':'&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;'}" \ > /tmp/do-firewall.sh
chmod a+x /tmp/do-firewall.sh /tmp/do-firewall.sh
